    • Constructor Detail

      • CraftableWeapon

        public CraftableWeapon​(java.lang.String name,
                       char displayChar,
                       int damage,
                       java.lang.String verb,
                       ItemCapability itemCapability)
        Constructor. Creates a new CraftableWeapon object with an ItemCapabiity (Craftable or non_craftable)
        Parameters:
        name - name of the weapon
        displayChar - character used to display weapon on the map when not being carried
        damage - damage done by a particular weapon
        verb - a string which shows action performed by the weapon
        itemCapability - used to determine whether the weapon is craftable or not

    • Method Detail

      • getAllowableActions

        public java.util.List<Action> getAllowableActions()
        getAllowableActions returns a List of actions that weapon lets actor perform.
        Overrides:
        getAllowableActions in class Item
        Returns:
        an unmodifiable list of Actions

      • getCraftItemAction

        public CraftItemAction getCraftItemAction​(Actor actor)
        getCraftItemAction Checks whether the weapon is craftable or not and returns a craftItemAction if craftable, else, returns null
        Parameters:
        actor - the Actor carrying the weapon
        Returns:
        a craftItemAction or null.

      • tick

        public void tick​(Location currentLocation,
                 Actor actor)
        tick keeps a track of the turns. only called when the item is being carried. also adds craftItemAction to the actions list.
        Overrides:
        tick in class Item
        Parameters:
        currentLocation - The location of the actor carrying this Item.
        actor - The actor carrying this Item.
